info.title: Process Automation
info.description: Contains APIs used within the Process Automation Cell, to support business processes.

get.summary: The purpose of this API is to retrieve the POI data for a specific Login ID.
get.description:
The purpose of this API is to retrieve the POI data for a specific Login ID.

Authentication: not required

parameters.name: platform_code
parameters.description: Denotes that the platform to direct the request to. Values include: V1 or V2

parameters.name: login_id
parameters.description: The Login ID to identify who to get the POI data for.

parameters.name: created_by
parameters.description: The internal user or system user for audit purposes.

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.
